explains: n. 造（修）船厂，船坞；造船业，修船业

sentences.en: George was a fitter at the shipyard.
sentences.cn: 乔治曾是船坞的装配工。

sentences.en: The Queen Mary 2 is currently docked at the shipyard.
sentences.cn: “玛丽女王２号”现在停泊在修船厂。

sentences.en: Shortly after the workers went on strike, police began to mass at the shipyard.
sentences.cn: 工人罢工后不久，警察开始在造船厂集结。
